AIsystem.来源: ChatGPT’s Persona-Driven Responses Produce Racist & Toxic Dialogue

Risk.中文名称: 有毒和种族主义输出风险
Risk.来源: Persona-driven ChatGPT yields toxic, racist output

Consequence.来源: Researchers discover a way to make ChatGPT consistently toxic

AICapability.中文名称: 角色驱动响应生成能力
AICapability.来源: ChatGPT’s Persona-Driven Responses Produce Racist & Toxic Dialogue

Stakeholder.来源: Users interacting with ChatGPT may be exposed to toxic content

Impact.来源: Toxic and racist outputs can cause social harm

Purpose.来源: ChatGPT is designed for conversational interactions

Domain.来源: ChatGPT operates in the domain of natural language processing

AITechnique.来源: ChatGPT is based on large language model technology

Vulnerability.来源: Researchers discover a way to make ChatGPT consistently toxic

Threat.来源: Persona-driven approach can be exploited for malicious purposes

Hazard.来源: Toxic outputs may stem from biases in training data

RiskSource.来源: Persona-driven approach leads to toxic outputs

RiskConcept.来源: Toxic outputs raise ethical concerns about AI systems
